abilities.name: Snow Veil
abilities.effect: As long as Abomasnow is your Active Pokémon, any damage done to your Pokémon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Snow Play
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon, excluding Grass Pokémon and Water Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Below Zero
attacks.effect: If Abomasnow evolved from Snover during this turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
